Goal 5 - Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls

= Updated!
Status Indicator
Improving measures 5.1.1 Whether or not legal frameworks are in place to promote, enforce and monitor equality and non-discrimination on the basis of sex
Reported online 5.2.1 Proportion of ever-partnered women and girls aged 15 years and older subjected to physical, sexual or psychological violence by a current or former intimate partner in the previous 12 months, by form of violence and by age
Exploring data 5.2.2 Proportion of women and girls aged 15 years and older subjected to sexual violence by persons other than an intimate partner in the previous 12 months, by age and place of occurrence
Exploring data 5.3.1 Proportion of women aged 20-24 years who were married or in a union before age 15 and before age 18
Exploring data 5.3.2 Proportion of girls and women aged 15-49 years who have undergone female genital mutilation/cutting, by age
Reported online 5.4.1 Proportion of time spent on unpaid domestic and care work, by sex, age and location
Reported online 5.5.1 Proportion of seats held by women in (a) national parliaments and (b) local governments
Reported online 5.5.2 Proportion of women in managerial positions
Exploring data 5.6.1 Proportion of women aged 15-49 years who make their own informed decisions regarding sexual relations, contraceptive use and reproductive health care
Improving measures 5.6.2 Number of countries with laws and regulations that guarantee full and equal access to women and men aged 15 and older to sexual and reproductive health care, information and education
Exploring data 5.a.1 (a) Proportion of total agricultural population with ownership or secure rights over agricultural land, by sex; and (b) share of women among owners or rightsbearers of agricultural land, type of tenure
Improving measures 5.a.2 Proportion of countries where the legal framework (including customary law) guarantees women's equal rights to land ownership and/or control
Reported online 5.b.1 Proportion of individuals who own a mobile telephone, by sex
Improving measures 5.c.1 Proportion of countries with systems to track and make public allocations for gender equality and women’s empowerment
Return to top

About

This is the official website of the United States of America used for providing information on the U.S. National Statistics for the U.N. Sustainable Development Goals. It is developed in collaboration with the US Office of Management and Budget, Office of Information and Regulatory Affairs: the US Department of State, Office of International Organizations; the US General Services Administration; and the US Office of Science and Technology Policy.
